colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES SRID GSUM BDAG MO DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR GYI RGYAL MO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I GSER SKYEMS BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAL KUN MKHYEN BCE BA DUS GSUM GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I BDAG NYID 'PHAGS MCHOG PHYAG NA PADMA NGUR SMRIG GAR GYI RNAM ROL BA, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN CING GZIGS PA CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I DPAL BZANG POS BKA' STZAL BA SPYI BOR MNOS TE ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR NAS PHUL BA'O, ,)
